abstract: A third of its 16 percent stake in the China Construction Bank is said to have fetched $7.3 billion for Bank of America’s capital-raising effort.
snippet: A third of its 16 percent stake in the China Construction Bank is said to have fetched $7.3 billion for Bank of America’s capital-raising effort.
lead_paragraph: Seeking to raise capital to appease regulators, Bank of America agreed on Tuesday to sell about a third of its 16 percent stake in China Construction Bank for $7.3 billion, according to people briefed on the deal.

headline.main: China Asset Said to Be Sold by Bank of America
headline.print_headline: China Asset Said to Be Sold by Bank Of America

byline.original: By Louise Story and David Barboza
